description: A design system built to ensure consistency and accessibility across government education platforms. With reusable components and clear guidelines, it streamlines digital development while maintaining a cohesive user experience.

A set of pre-built templates that simplify user research and information architecture. They help users set up studies faster while following best practicesâ€”making research more efficient for beginners and experts alike.

A centralised platform where teachers can access new assessment standards, subject materials, and updates. Designed for clarity and ease of use, it simplifies navigation and improves access to essential resources.
